Description: Unique identifier for each training session
Name of the participant attending the training
Name of the trainer conducting the training
Subject or topic of the training session
Date when the training session begins
Date when the training session ends
Current status of the training session
Total duration of the training session in hours
Percentage score achieved by the participant upon completion
Rating provided by the participant on the training experience
Format of the training (e.g., Online, In-Person, Hybrid)
Location of the training session, virtual or physical address
Cost of the training session in USD
Indicates if a certificate was issued upon completion
